String.string: Please get component samples from the {@creature:46#7006#jurnagg portals} for me.
Good work! I'll report the research results soon.
Break {@linkcreature:46#7006#jurnagg portals} in the {@Rgn:46009$$Three Towers Spires} and collect an argon component.
Go to the {@Rgn:46017$$Shadowspark Chamber} and deliver argon component to {@creature:246#1034$$Hogird}.
